full_threads.body: Thanks @ricaV2 update sent to client.

@chris @ricaV2  All good now on this one

+15mins Thanks!

https://mets.edu.au/contact-us/
https://mets.edu.au/smart-and-skilled/
@joel could you please help me with this? the scripts are not working and I don't know how to add the form using the external link.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Rika,

Can you please assist me with a couple of updates to the https://mets.edu.au/ website?

1. Replace the embedded form on https://mets.edu.au/contact-us/ with the following:

—//—

OR
https://mets.freshsales.io/web_forms/3a90fe62911c3c22a19bb89a398943c1a71edb5b536aa3e58a6c9e567746ad9f/form.html
—//—

2. Replace the embedded form on: https://mets.edu.au/smart-and-skilled/ with the following:

—//—

OR
https://mets.freshsales.io/web_forms/8f5ea10151d11613a2f07b77a2347b20183b2b39b4397d8fc8a01790b62a6d68/form.html
—//—

Okay we have:
Contact -<scriptsrc='https://mets.freshsales.io/web_forms/3a90fe62911c3c22a19bb89a398943c1a71edb5b536aa3e58a6c9e567746ad9f/form.js' crossorigin='anonymous' id='fs_3a90fe62911c3c22a19bb89a398943c1a71edb5b536aa3e58a6c9e567746ad9f <https://mets.freshsales.io/web_forms/3a90fe62911c3c22a19bb89a398943c1a71edb5b536aa3e58a6c9e567746ad9f/form.js'%20crossorigin='anonymous'%20id='fs_3a90fe62911c3c22a19bb89a398943c1a71edb5b536aa3e58a6c9e567746ad9f>'></script>
OR
https://mets.freshsales.io/web_forms/3a90fe62911c3c22a19bb89a398943c1a71edb5b536aa3e58a6c9e567746ad9f/form.html <https://mets.freshsales.io/web_forms/3a90fe62911c3c22a19bb89a398943c1a71edb5b536aa3e58a6c9e567746ad9f/form.html>
Smart and skilled eligibility –<scriptsrc='https://mets.freshsales.io/web_forms/8f5ea10151d11613a2f07b77a2347b20183b2b39b4397d8fc8a01790b62a6d68/form.js' crossorigin='anonymous' id='fs_8f5ea10151d11613a2f07b77a2347b20183b2b39b4397d8fc8a01790b62a6d68 <https://mets.freshsales.io/web_forms/8f5ea10151d11613a2f07b77a2347b20183b2b39b4397d8fc8a01790b62a6d68/form.js'%20crossorigin='anonymous'%20id='fs_8f5ea10151d11613a2f07b77a2347b20183b2b39b4397d8fc8a01790b62a6d68>'></script>
OR
https://mets.freshsales.io/web_forms/8f5ea10151d11613a2f07b77a2347b20183b2b39b4397d8fc8a01790b62a6d68/form.html <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmets.freshsales.io%2Fweb_forms%2F8f5ea10151d11613a2f07b77a2347b20183b2b39b4397d8fc8a01790b62a6d68%2Fform.html&data=05%7C01%7CBTudela%40dsa.org.au%7C496863505c08478352cc08db20fb123f%7C6045f719c4ba41868eb5e7b9a051455d%7C0%7C0%7C638140034938106804%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=m%2Bk5X%2FlkmrZqSauPw%2FIFAFTHAnlbfDvkOdoM9mXhHb0%3D&reserved=0>
They couldn’t find a form for feedback and complaints so I’ve asked if they’re still happy for it to go to the info@mets email address


Brittany Tudela​​​​
Marketing Manager

What can I say, It was simply meant to be!

Noted, can you please provide us with the Freshsales code for each form:

Contact
Feedback and complaints
Smart and Skilled eligibility

Please note that each form submission from the time of launch until now is being sent to: info@mets.edu.au <mailto:info@mets.edu.au>

Regards,

Happy Friday!
Very weird timing as I just got a reply about this!

The team said those forms should link to freshsales but at the moment they’re not getting the submissions.

Will you just need the form code from freshsales to place again?

Brittany Tudela​​​​

On 3 Mar 2023, at 12:01 pm, Chris Paradowski <chris@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:chris@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Brittany,

Great to catch up on all things DSA, it prompted me to loop back to a couple of outstanding METS elements.

Website forms

Any chance you can bump the relevant teams for their preferred contact emails? The 3 in question are:

Contact form
Feedback and complaints
Smart and skilled eligibility


Google Analytics

Can you please add: support@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:support@wolfiq.com.au> to the METS Google Analytics account?

I’ll get the dev team to get this up and running.

Thanks and speak soon,


<~WRD2518.jpg>
